item.title: Scrcpy: Display & control your Android devices connected over USB or TCP/IP
item.description: - scrcpy is a lightweight application that allows users to mirror and control their Android devices via USB or TCP/IP without rooting their device.

item.title: Remove "This incident will be reported." from user warnings
item.description: - The "This incident will be reported" message is being removed from user warnings in the sudo program.

item.title: Live Starlink Satellite & Coverage Map
item.description: - The text is irrelevant to the title and does not provide any meaningful content related to Live Starlink Satellite & Coverage Map.

item.title: Children aged 2-6 successfully trained to acquire absolute pitch (2012)
Get The TLDR Of Any YouTube Video
item.description: - You-tldr is a tool that allows users to summarize YouTube videos, including searching, downloading, and interacting with videos in multiple languages.

item.title: Internet in a Box
item.description: - Internet-in-a-Box is a solution to bring the internet to remote communities without an internet connection, wirelessly serving anyone nearby with a smartphone, tablet, or laptop.

item.title: Termux is an Android terminal emulator & Linux environment app
item.description: - Termux is an Android terminal emulator and Linux environment app that works without rooting or setup.

item.title: Study: ChatGPT outperforms physicians in quality, empathetic answers to patients
item.description: - A new study published in JAMA Internal Medicine suggests that ChatGPT, an AI assistant, outperforms physicians in quality, empathetic answers to patient health questions.

item.title: Sensenmann: Code Deletion at Scale
item.description: - Google's multi-billion-line mono-repository, Piper, stores all the code-related source codes, which could become difficult to maintain over time.

item.title: MRSK: Deploy web apps anywhere
item.description: - MRSK is a tool that enables the deployment of web apps on any host with the use of a dynamic reverse-proxy called Traefik and SSHKit to execute commands.
